summary: This is a simple mod that replaces Tundra and Rift grass.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FiV0UGs.jpg?1[/img]

[b]Description:
[/b]This is a simple mod that replaces Tundra and Reach grass with a fall-themed yellow/brown grass (made by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/934000/?]elinen[/url]). I highly recommend you to use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42370/?]Unique Grasses and Groundcovers (by [b]Josh Ezzell)[/b][/url] together with this grass for the best results. It is not recommended to use any other grass mods else than those that replaces vanilla textures — i do in fact use many grasses from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul by [b]vurt[/b][/url] as well, but only grasses and textures that replaces vanilla ones. These grass-textures might work well with earlier versions of SFO, but they dont fit his new tundra very well.

[b]Mods i use in images:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures (by NebuLa)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul 2.0 trees (by Vurt)[/url]

[b]Credits:[/b]
[b][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/934000/?]Elinen [/url][/u]for everything. Check out his resources [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/934000/?]here[/url][/b]
author: partly me
